Package com.st.BlueSTSDK.Features

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FeatureAccelerationEvent.FeatureAccelerationEventListener
    Extend the FeatureListener for notify also the enabling/disabling of a new algorithm
    FeatureAutoConfigurable.FeatureAutoConfigurationListener
    extend the Feature.FeatureListener with the callback used for notify the configuration status
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeviceTimestampFeature
    Class that a feature has to extend if it doesn't has the timestamp field, as timestamp the system time will be used
    FeatureAcceleration
    Feature that will contain the data from an accelerometer sensor.
    FeatureAccelerationEvent
    Feature that will contain the different event that can be discovered using an accelerometer data.
    FeatureActivity
    Feature that will contain the activity detect by the activity recognition code that run on the node
    FeatureAudioADPCM
    Feature that contains the compressed audio data acquired form a microphone.
    FeatureAudioADPCMSync
    Feature that contains the audio synchronization parameters necessary to ADPCM audio decompression
    FeatureAutoConfigurable
    Extend the feature adding the possibility to be configured sending a command message to the node.
    FeatureBattery
    Feature that will contain the battery data, this is not the standard battery since will contain more information.
    FeatureCarryPosition
    The feature will contain the device position
    FeatureDirectionOfArrival
    Feature that contains the sound angle of arrival.
    FeatureFreeFall Deprecated
    use FeatureAccelerationEvent enabling FeatureAccelerationEvent.AccelerationEvent.FREE_FALL
    FeatureGenPurpose
    It is a special feature that is used during the development and doesn't follow the sdk schema.
    FeatureGyroscope
    Feature that contains the data from a gyroscope sensor.
    FeatureHumidity
    Feature that contains the humidity sensor values, this sensor export the percentage of water in the air.
    FeatureLuminosity
    Feature that contains the data comes form a luminosity sensor.
    FeatureMagnetometer
    Feature used for contains the data from an magnetometer sensor.
    FeatureMemsGesture
    The feature will contain the a detected gesture using data from the mems sensor
    FeatureMemsSensorFusion
    This feature will contains the quaternion compute in the device using the sensor fusion algorithm (gyroscope + accelerometer + magnetometer).
    FeatureMemsSensorFusionCompact
    This feature manage the quaternion data in the compact way, in this package the quaternion component are encoded using a int16 with 5 decimal values, and sent in group of 2-4 quaternions
    FeatureMicLevel
    This feature contains the audio level from an array of microphones
    FeaturePedometer
    Feature that contains the pedometer information, the number of steps and the frequency
    FeaturePressure
    Feature that will contain the data from the pressure sensor
    FeatureProximity
    Feature that contains the data comes form a proximity sensor.
    FeatureProximityGesture
    The feature will contain the a detected gesture using the proximity sensors
    FeatureSwitch
    Feature that contains a switch status, each bit can be mapped in a single single switch.
    FeatureTemperature
    Feature that contains the data comes form a temperature sensor.
    Field
    Class that describe a feature data field
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FeatureAccelerationEvent.AccelerationEvent
    Event that can be fired by the accelerometer
    FeatureAccelerationEvent.DetectableEvent
    Algorithm that can run in the accelerometer
    FeatureActivity.ActivityType
    Enum containing the possible result of the activity recognition
    FeatureBattery.BatteryStatus
    Possible battery status
    FeatureCarryPosition.Position
    Enum containing the possible result of the carry position detection
    FeatureMemsGesture.Gesture
    Enum containing the possible result of the gesture detection
    FeatureProximityGesture.Gesture
    Enum containing the possible result of the gesture detection
    Field.Type
    Type used for store this Field
